about_the_game:
Dangerous beauties are attacking – the only way to stand up for yourself and your world is to gather your collection of cards and challenge them to a game of your own rules! If the villains win, they will take over humanity, but if you win, you will get... villains?!

In this engaging card game, you will be able to defeat your opponents round after round, which will bring you closer to one of the four mysterious heroines. With each round, you will delve into their unique stories, revealing their secrets and gaining intimacy.

EmyLiveShow: BossRush – erotic card game with visual novel elements, where you need to defeat the conquerors of humanity.

  • The stakes are getting more serious. If the first opponent threatens only your life and health, each subsequent opponent will desire more: the submission of the city, the country or even the whole planet!

  • There is more reward in winning. Each victory brings you closer to your opponent. Discover intimate scenes and learn their secrets!

  • Easy to learn – fun to fight. The card battle system is simple enough to get started easily, and exciting enough to enjoy your victory at the end of the battle.

  • Enjoy hot scenes with characters to your liking. Even when the world is in danger, there is no need to forget such simple pleasures.

  • Four romantic interests in your path! No need to choose who you like best, collect them all in your colorful winner's harem

  • Roleplay the way you want. Whether you want to be romantic and gentle or rough and dominant is up to you!

  • Meet familiar EmyLiveShow heroines in the role of villains! Get to know Emy, Nia, Uma, and Six in more detail – the heroines from the V-tube hentai hostess club! Immerse yourself in their history and dark sides, trying to stop their aggression or embrace it in the most perverted of ways!

The game reveals the topics of: mistress, BDSM, pet play, kink, latex, masochism, sadism, sadomasochism, dominant, submissive, bondage, male dominance/maledom, male submission, female dominance/femdom, female submission, dominatrix, rough sex, masturbation, sexual roles‎, stripping, flashing, semi-public sex, sex toys, oral sex, vaginal sex, anal sex, foot fetish, erotic massage

  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
